page.title: 08CLUBS IN MORFA BYCHAN
page.content: The residents of the area are lucky in having the use of a disused school as Y Ganolfan (community centre).It is managed by a committee who are kept busy organizing fund-raising events to repair and improve the property.It is let at a low rent to various clubs and societies and is fully booked during the winter.It is regularly used by a dance club,Welsh learners,computer club,sewing classes,men's circuit training,women's keep fit,ramblers' club and the Women's Institute. Occasional events are organized like card games,slide shows and public meetings about matters of concern to the community.The most popular event of the year is the Carol Evening,which includes a visit from Father Christmas and a feast of mince pies.
